developer_mode.label: Developer Mode
developer_mode.comment: Use the Australia Post test environment to get shipping rates. Not recommended for production use.

api_key.label: API Key
api_key.comment: Register for an API key at: http://auspost.com.au/devcentre/registration.html

signature_on_delivery.label: Signature on Delivery
signature_on_delivery.comment: Controls whether shipping methods with the Signature on Delivery option are shown. If set to 'Required', only shipping methods with this option will be shown. If set to 'Never', shipping methods with this option will not be shown. If set to 'Optional', shipping methods both with and without this option will be shown, allowing the customer to choose.

extra_cover.label: Extra Cover
extra_cover.comment: Controls whether shipping methods with the Extra Cover option are shown (see above).

pick_up.label: Pick Up (Metro Only)
pick_up.comment: Controls whether shipping methods with the Pick Up option are shown (see above).

length_attribute.label: Length Attribute
length_attribute.comment: Product attribute code used for length. This will be used to calculate shipping rates for orders with only one product. For orders with more than one product (or if this field is not set) then Default Parcel Length will be used for calculating prices.

width_attribute.label: Width Attribute
width_attribute.comment: Product attribute code used for width (see above).

height_attribute.label: Height Attribute
height_attribute.comment: Product attribute code used for height (see above).

merchant_location_id.label: Merchant Location ID
merchant_location_id.comment: Provided by Australia Post. The unique ID specifying a specific merchant location.

post_charge_account.label: Post Charge To Account
post_charge_account.comment: Merchant account to which Australia Post "post" the charges against for invoicing purposes.

signature_required.label: Signature Required
signature_required.comment: If Yes, Australia Post will attempt to capture a signature and if no-one is in attendance the consignment will be "carded".

signature_cost.label: Signature Cost
signature_cost.comment: Additional amount to charge for requiring a signature.

insurance_step.label: Insurance Step
insurance_step.comment: If insurance is $1.05 per $100, set this field to 100.0

insurance_cost_per_step.label: Insurance Cost Per Step
insurance_cost_per_step.comment: If insurance is $1.05 per $100, set this field to 1.05

return_state.label: Return State Code
return_state.comment: Must be a two- or three-letter state code

calculate_using_customerid.label: Use Customer ID for Ref
calculate_using_customerid.comment: Normally set to NO unless you use BPAY for recurring payments. Guest checkouts are NOT supported if this is set to YES.

accept_credit_cards.label: Accepts Credit Cards
accept_credit_cards.comment: Set to NO if you do not accept credit card payments through BPAY. This simply changes the text presented to the customer.

use_mod_10_v_5.label: Use Mod 10 Version 5
use_mod_10_v_5.comment: If set to NO, Mod 10 Version 1 is used.

message.label: Message
message.comment: Displayed during checkout. Customise this to notify your customers that they will be presented with BPAY information after checkout.

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.comment: Turn on address validation during the billing and shipping sections of the checkout.

backend.label: Backend
backend.comment: You will need to fill in the Australia Post Delivery Choices section to use the Australia Post address validation service.

delivery_choices_account_email.label: Delivery Choices Email Address
delivery_choices_account_email.comment: Your Australia Post Delivery Choices email address is required.

delivery_choices_account_password.label: Delivery Choices Password
delivery_choices_account_password.comment: Your Australia Post Delivery Choices password is required.

clickandsend.label: Australia Post Click & Send
clickandsend.comment: Allows merchants to export a CSV of selected orders into the Click & Send service for bulk processing. Please note the generated CSV file won't work if you select "Pick and Ship" when importing into Click & Send.

active.label: Enabled
active.comment: Please note you won't be able to import the Courier Post shipping methods or standard shipping methods that have options, e.g. "Parcel Post + Extra Cover", into Click & Send.

filter.label: Filter Shipping Methods
filter.comment: Don't display Australia Post shipping methods that can't be imported into Click & Send during checkout.

export_all.label: Allow Export All Shipping Methods
export_all.comment: Allows the merchant to export any order with an Australia Post shipping method even if it can't be imported into Click & Send.

category_of_items_explanation.label: Category of Items Explanation
category_of_items_explanation.comment: This is mandatory if Category of Items is Other.

return_address.label: Return Address
return_address.comment: Return to the following address if undeliverable

from_abn.label: From ABN
from_abn.comment: Click & Send does not support adding spaces to your ABN.

use_cubicweight.label: Use Cubic Weight ?
use_cubicweight.comment: Ask your Australia Post account manager how your account is setup.

is_signature_required.label: Is Signature Required ?
is_signature_required.comment: Should signature be required by default ? Specific shipping methods will override this setting. Check cost of service on your Australia Post contract.

print_ref1.label: Print Reference #1 ?
print_ref1.comment: Ref #1 contains the invoice number (if the order has been invoiced)

use_multiplegoodrecords.label: Use Multiple Good Records
use_multiplegoodrecords.comment: Sets whether to add each good as a row in the generated consignment (Yes) or just the last one (No). Leave as "No" unless otherwise advised by Australia Post.

allow_custom_charge_codes.label: Custom eParcel Charge Code
allow_custom_charge_codes.comment: Allow custom (non-standard) charge codes from uploaded CSV files? For example, "3I55".

default_charge_code_individual.label: Default Charge Code (Individual)
default_charge_code_individual.comment: The default charge code for individuals. Will be overridden by values in your table rates.

default_charge_code_business.label: Default Charge Code (Business)
default_charge_code_business.comment: The default charge code for businesses, as defined by the customer groups below. Will be overridden by values in your table rates.

business_groups.label: Business Customer Groups
business_groups.comment: The selected customer groups will use the "Business" version of the "Standard" and "Express" charge codes. Make sure your contract supports business (B2B) charge codes.

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.comment: Add the customer's email address to the CSV file.

level.label: Notification Level
level.comment: Set what kind of email notification the customer will receive.
